nodes.text: Colonel Alask Vrei was a male Twi'lek baron of a clan. He lost his holdings, but discovered a talent for starship tactics. He then became an officer.
Vrei was decorated for bravery during his service, and was outwardly aloof, and treated his crew was subjects, but also played hardball if the need be. He was considered to be harsh but fair.
He used a hold-out blaster, datapad, commlink, holoprojector, and recording rods in the military. He could speak Basic, Lekku, and Ryl.
Alask Vrei is used as an example of a character in the Star Wars Roleplaying Game in the 2002 article On Wings of Rogues in Star Wars Gamer 9.
